info.name: Hide Google Navigation Bar ( toggle on hover )
info.description: A part of code I use in my Google Reader style http://userstyles.org/styles/55756/google-reader-imho-old-blue-style )

/* =====================================================
 * Title: HIDE GOOGLE NAVIGATION BAR ( toggle on hover )
 * Author: ktototam
 * Version: 01
 * Date: 13-11-2011
 * ===================================================== */

#gb, #gbx3, #gbx4 {
    height: 3px !important;
}
#message-area-container, #loading-area-container, #loadingStatus {
    top: 3px !important;
}
#gbw {
    display: none  !important;
}
#gbwc {
    visibility: hidden !important;
}
#gb:hover>#gbw {
    display: block !important;
}
#gb:hover>#gbx3, #gb:hover>#gbx4 {
    height: 29px !important;
}
#gb:hover>#gb {
    height: 30px !important;
}
#gb:hover>#gbwc {
    visibility: visible !important;
}
#gb:hover~#message-area-container, #gb:hover~#loading-area-container {
    display: none !important;
}
}
